column1: #Text=Polycrystalline powders of Y3.96Nd0.04Al2O9 (1 at% Nd:Y4Al2O9)\rwere synthesized by using modified sol-gel (Pechini) method as follows: yttrium oxide and neodymium oxide were dissolved in 0.4 mol L\1 solution of acetic acid at 65BC for about 20 h.
#Text=When the\rsesquioxides were completely dissolved aluminum nitrate was\radded.
#Text=This mixture was stirred for 1 h and then ethylene glycol\rwas added and the solution was stirred again for 1 h.
#Text=The obtained\rmixture was evaporated slowly until the foam was formed.
#Text=The\rfoam was dried at 150 BC for 30 h and then ground in an agate\rmortar to a fine powder.
#Text=This powder was calcined in air at 1100 BC\rfor 10 h.
